price: Olúwa mi, ṣàforíjìn fún èmi àti àwọn òbí mi méjèèjì àti àwọn onígbàgbọ́ òdodo ní ọjọ́ tí ìṣírò-iṣẹ́ yóò ṣẹlẹ̀.”
arabic: رَبَّنَا ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡحِسَابُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā igh'fir lī waliwālidayya walil'mu'minīna yawma yaqūmu al-ḥisābu
